title: Chronos
details:
My first custom PC build, marking the beginning of my hardware journey. This system taught me the fundamentals of computer hardware assembly and troubleshooting.

While the specific components have been repurposed for other projects, this build represents an important milestone in my technical development.

System specifications:

  • CPU: AMD FX-6300 3.5GHz(6c)
  • RAM: 24GB DDR3-1600MHz
  • GPU: Asus ROG Strix GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • 3TB HDD
  • Case: Corsair Carbide Series SPEC-01
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
